CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: When PQCDTB and PC71BM were fabricated in a 1 : 1 weight ratio , the open - circuit voltage ( V OC ) , short - circuit current ( J SC ) , fill factor ( FF ) , and power conversion efficiency ( PCE ) were 0.79 V , 5.6 mA cm^-2 , 55.8% and 2.5% , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

1. PQCDTB
2. PC71BM

These are the two material names mentioned in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. PQCDTB
2. PC71BM

These are the only entities in the paragraph that can be identified as Material Names.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: When PQCDTB and PC71BM were fabricated in a 1 : 1 weight ratio , the open - circuit voltage ( V OC ) , short - circuit current ( J SC ) , fill factor ( FF ) , and power conversion efficiency ( PCE ) were 0.79 V , 5.6 mA cm^-2 , 55.8% and 2.5% , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

1. open-circuit voltage (V OC)
2. short-circuit current (J SC)
3. fill factor (FF)
4. power conversion efficiency (PCE)
5. PQCDTB
6. PC71BM

These are the entities in the paragraph that can be identified as "Property Name" entities. The first five are physical properties of the semiconductor materials PQCDTB and PC71BM, while the last two are the names of the specific semiconductor materials.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. open-circuit voltage (V OC)
2. short-circuit current (J SC)
3. fill factor (FF)
4. power conversion efficiency (PCE)

These are the entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to material properties. The names of the semiconductor materials, PQCDTB and PC71BM, are not considered material properties, but rather identifiers for the materials whose properties are being described.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| open-circuit voltage (V OC) |
| short-circuit current (J SC) |
| fill factor (FF) |
| power conversion efficiency (PCE) |
